column1: '''Stephen Thorne''' is a renowned radio actor and audiobook narrator. His credits include Aslan in [[Brian Sibley]]'s radio versions of [[C.S. Lewis]]' ''The Chronicles of Narnia'' and several characters in Doctor Who.
* [[1981]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column2: The Lord of the Rings (radio series)]]'' - [[Treebeard]]

column1: * [[1992]]: ''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)
column2: Tales from the Perilous Realm (radio series)]]''
